newsitem.title: HONG KONG: Trade in Sing Tao shares suspended.
newsitem.headline: Trade in Sing Tao shares suspended.

text.p: Trading in shares of newspaper publisher and printer Sing Tao Holdings Ltd was suspended on Wednesday at the company's request pending an announcement, the Hong Kong stock exchange said.
On Tuesday, Sing Tao shares rose HK$0.40 to HK$3.80.
The newspaper publisher and printer has been affected by lower advertising revenues and higher newsprint costs.
In December, it reported a 76.2 percent fall in interim net profit to HK$4.92 million for the six months ended September 30, 1996.
